changeSet.comment: Update concepts with class Test to LabTest
changeSet.sql: SELECT concept_class_id INTO @cc_labtest FROM concept_class WHERE concept_class.name = 'LabTest'; UPDATE concept c JOIN concept_reference_map rmap ON c.concept_id = rmap.concept_id JOIN concept_reference_term rterm ON rmap.concept_reference_term_id = rterm.concept_reference_term_id JOIN concept_reference_source rsource ON rsource.concept_source_id = rterm.concept_source_id JOIN concept_class cc ON c.class_id = cc.concept_class_id SET c.class_id = @cc_labtest WHERE cc.name = 'Test' AND c.retired = FALSE AND rsource.name= 'CIEL';
